alert.note: Alert for New Castle (Delaware) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly (New Jersey, Delaware, Southeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 27 at 3:41PM EDT until June 27 at 4:30PM EDT by NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly
info.description: The National Weather Service in Mount Holly NJ has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Central New Castle County in northern Delaware... Northwestern Salem County in southern New Jersey... * Until 430 PM EDT. * At 341 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Saint Georges, or 9 miles southeast of Newark, moving northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to vehicles is possible. Wind damage to roofs, siding, trees, and power lines is possible. * Locations impacted include... Wilmington, Pennsville, Carneys Point, New Castle, Penns Grove, Delaware City, Saint Georges, Bear, Delaware Memorial Bridge, Wilmington Manor and Glasgow. This includes the following highways... New Jersey Turnpike near exit 1. Interstate 295 in New Jersey between mile markers 0 and 6. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. To report severe weather, contact your nearest law enforcement agency. They will send your report to the National Weather Service office in Mount Holly NJ.
